msgs.Content: As the drums count down to the last song for the night, Dead inside, the crowd prepare themselves to show The seprent riders what a real crowd is like. As Bloodlord opens the song with the easily recognized  bass line, and Shane providing him with a set of heavy chords, a wall of death appears appears in the midst of the crowd. others form circle pits, while the remaining  ones reach out for the two guitarists. one of them, is Nails

"Hey...hey man-!" Nails called. Nails was what Verda-London called a string sweeper, it was recent slang for someone who was hunting for a slot within the music group rounds to fill in a empty seat--didn't matter if the odds were against him. It was normal for string sweepers to try to catch the band's attention. But the third sector security said otherwise. /n
"Unauthorized disturbance...unauthorized disturbance..." The crowd was almost pushed back by the feeling of an invisible wave and the stage rocked slightly.

Though the three band members felt the slight rocking, they kept on going as if nothing had happened. After all, they had been facing worse conditions before. During the bridge of the song, the crowd started to sing along, at such a high volume that the band almost didn't hear themselves. They thought to themselves: "Wow. these guys really know how pack a punch."

Nails didn't join in the crowd, talking with a security droid on the side. Nails didn't really seem to care what the droid was concerned about, he groaned and took out a cigarette, "Stop, stop, stop...look, I'm, uh...I work for

"I work for their manager, something of a new secretary." "I have heard this excuse before Mister Leed." Nails groaned. "Just let me out back...bathroom break." "There are bathrooms placed at the sides for these reasons; you cannot go back stage without a pass or permit. It's in Policy 208." Nails shoved the cigarette into the droids flap in response. "800 pound fine," the droid added.

As The vocalist, Nocturlos, screams the final words, "DEAD INSIDE!", and the song drives towards it's conclusion. a satisfied crowd transfer the rest of their energy left into one powerful applause, that almost lifts the roof. Bloodlord and Shane bring forth some picks they throw into the sea of mice, who are desperately trying to grab one. Nocturlos brings forth a couple of his signature drum sticks, and tosses them as well. Afterwards, Shane spots Nails. "Hey Greenday!" Nails turns around, and sees a pick flying towards him. without thinking, he stretches out his arm, and grabs it.
*Screaming into the mic* "Thank you motherfuckers! see you guys next year!"
Before getting off the stage, a security guard is approaching him, stating that there is a maniac trying to get back stage
"Stay back Mr. Frost. I'll take care of this myself"

Nails overhears and chuckles at the term, maniac? That wasn't polite. He looks at the pick and keeps it in his pocket, "What's a guy gotta do to make some money in this town?" He jokes, the droid beeps and boops before hovering across the floor. Nails has the urge to trip it, but he holds back just to see how things play out.
*I tap Nails at the shoulder* "Hey you. I hear you are causing trouble. something I can help you with?"

"You're, uh, that Shane dude...right?" Nails smiles with an almost childish delight underneath his smile, and his hands dig into his pockets, "Look, my old band kinda broke up...and I got a sick axe..." Nice one Nails, you might as well have been asking your high school crush out while you step on those words like unseen toadstools in a garden, he thought to himself.
*I am a bit confused* "Nails? Oh, you mean the guitarist. No, My name is Nocturlos; drummer and vocalist."

"Oh...that's embarrassing..." Not the first time he got mixed up, he couldn't tell the difference between salt and sugar for a while, "Well, my offer still stands you know...and Shane did sent me this..." Nails showed the pick, "Look I'll fill out the paperwork if ya need it. But I can work well..." He chuckled nervously. Despite my sickness. Despite this illness that stupid drug GLENN--"Think I can talk with you and Shane about an opening?"

*Since the crowd still is going while getting out, I really didn't quite catch what Nails said* "Look. whatever it is you want to talk to us about, feel free to join me and the other two backstage." *a slightly evil smile appears on my face*
Nails starts to feel a little nervous but he knows better not to show it, "I'll take your lead."
*We pass a security who blocks the entrance*
"Hold it you two! Who do you think you are?"
*I bring up my identity card*
"Oh... Eh... Sorry Nocturlos. But what about this asslicker you have with you. Does he have sertification?"
Nails tiredly stretched his arms and placed them to the back of his head, and he surveys the area with his ears twitching and rotating.
"Yes he does. He is with me!"
"Nocto. You know how stuff works around here"
"We can't just give permission to whoever who wants to get behind the scenes to meet you gu...."
"Are all security guards this antsy?" Nails asks teasingly at the guard.
"What did you call me runt!? HUH!"
Nails chuckled, "Wouldn't you like to know; you're way too on edge to do your job correctly."
The security guard picks up Nails, and looks him straight into the eyes

*I punch a hole in the wall right beside the guard's face.* "Have I not made myself clear enough? Do you know who you are talking to? I am in charge of which fans walk past this door! Now stop being such a wanna-be, and PUT HIM DOWN!"
*changes the attitude* "OK, Nocturlos. As you wish" *puts Nails down*
"GET to he side! And if you call me "Nocto" one more time, people will see straight through your thick skull!"
Sorry, I forgot to put on a brb message, I was in a hurry
Nails giggled slightly at the nickname, 'Nocto' sounded like a cute pet name, making Nocturlos sound more like a cuddle bug. Nails giggled silently more at the mental image.
*I turn towards Nails as I hear him giggling. His smile was stretched all the way out to his ears, and his teeth were shining.* "What's so funny, if I dare ask you?"
"Nothing, nothing, just a funny thought...come on, let's go see Shane," Nails isn't in the mood for arguing or getting into a beef fest with Nocturlos.

*Backstage, Shane and Bloodlord have already been treated by their women. Their sweat has been dried off, and two cases of beer is placed in the center of the room. My lady approaches me, and prepares to dry my sweat off, and give me a tease, but I tell her it can wait.* "Hey guys! change in plans." I say to my bandmates. "We got an eager fan here who wants to talk to us for a sec. We might have to postpone our drinking."

"Well Fuck that. I have already opened one, and my throat is dried out, so I am drinking this, whatever you say." *He started to chug the beer down, and in a few seconds, the bottle was empty. "Now. Who is this fan of ours, Nocturlos?"
Nails held up the guitar pick Shane have to him, "I got your invitation...which is why I'm here...more or less," he smiles a little smugly, leaning against the wall.

*He was about to say something, when all of sudden, his stomach began to rumble, and act like crazy. Shane leans forward, placing his hands on his stomach.* "What... What the fuck is happening?" he asks. The other ones begin to laugh. "SHUT THE FUCK UP!" Shane wheezed to the other band members.
Nails looked at them in confusion, "Er--about being part of the band-?" His question was drowned by the light laughter, and this left a sliver of nervousness on Nails.

None of the band members catches what Nails try to tell them. Shane's stomach kept on rumbling for seconds, before finally stopping. Then, Nocturlos brings Nails a chair, and they all gather in a sircle.
Nails hesitantly sits down, it's been a long time since he felt so nervous but tries to hold his composure.
"So tell us, Nails, Why do you want to talk to us?" The two other members looked at him, with dead serious eyes.
Nails felt the rush of confidence flow back, "I'm hoping to be your new member, I can be an extra guitarist. That is if you want an extra to help add an emphasis...I mean this in a good way."

The three members looked at each other with stone faces. Shane quicly sweeped his eyes back at Nails, looking at his clothes. It was a complete contrast from what the others were using. Bloodlord looked at his clothes too. Then they turned their attention back to Nails.
"So tell us, mister, how good are you? To play guitar, I mean."

"Really good...been playing this axe since I was 13..." Nails explained counting back years with his fingertips, "Uh...there's a gap between 5 to 12 but I'll spare you guys the sob story for next time," he pulled out a dirty guitar case, yet it was surprisingly well taken care of. Nails slowly pulled out a black axe guitar with a sharp blue V as the makers signature in the corner; there were odd lines below it, but the group just shrugged it off, "The man who gave this to calls this the Angel Shriek."
"That's...your guitar?" Shane asked, and his eyes widened up. "I have always wanted a guitar like that. Only 1500 of these were made. Also it just has the most awesome design of them all."

Nocturlos called for a sound tech, and asked him if their equipment had been packed up. "No." the tech said. Nocturlos then told him to go rig up a second guitar amp. They were going to have a rehersal.
"So...I'm in?" Nails asked, "As second?"

"We'll see. we are going to lead you through some songs. if you can play them, we will discuss it." The members went on stage, and grabbed their gear, and prepared themselves. The audience had already left, so the stage was completely empty.
Nails attached the amp to his axe and carefully held it, "All right, I'll follow..."

"What song should we play, Nocturlos?" Bloodlord asked. "Let's start easy." Nocturlos replied. "Let's play Smoke on the water. Every guitarist should know that one". Nocturlos then raises his drum sticks, and begin to count the others in. "1....2....1234"

There was a reason why Nails' guitar was called Angel Shriek...the others didn't realize it but Shane sure did. The moment Nails followed through, the axe released an enchanting ambience with each stroke and twang of the wires. It would've been heavenly if it wasn't so haunting. The axe was weeping...no shrieking for Seprent Riders glory.

"Smoke on the water.... And fire in the sky!" Nocturlos's crispy voice pounded through the speakers, and his steady beat filled the stage! Bloodlord's base made the heart rythm follow its tone, and the combination of Shane's and Nails' guitar tunes were eargasmic. Never before, had the band sounded that good. Shane's eyes were about to roll out, and his ears had grown in width. Ever since he first saw the commercial, he had wanted to hear that tune. His dream had become reality.

Nails stopped playing as soon as the band eventually stopped, he saw their gazes on him in a bewildering amazement. Nails, having not been picked up by another band before, took this as a negative thing. Did...he accidentally play off note?

*Runs towards Nails and is almost.* "That... is the most amazing thing I have ever heard in my entire life. How the fuck do you set your amp to get that sound?" Nails also rush towards him, and get on his knees. "You... Are a music God!"

Nails chuckled softly, "A music God? Nah, an old guy handed this to me and I just learned how to wield the blade...that's it," It was really humble of him to say such a thing; or maybe Nails just didn't want to off as too egotistical; that'd be a buzz kill to the other musicians.
"Tell me. What else can you play? This is fun!"

Nails chuckled lightly, his tail wagging, "A little bit of acoustic...some other guy at a bar taught me--and I'm pretty good at piano too, I self taught myself when I found the damn thing in an abandoned flat."

Shane giggled a bit. "I meant rock/metal songs. do you know any other songs except Smoke on the water?" The other member chuckles as well. Sure acoustics were fine now and then. But piano? Was he kidding?
Nails looked sheepish, "Children of the Grave," he answered, "Angel Shriek really gives it a nice haunt."
"Yeah, that sounds good. Let's give it a try." Nocturlos say, as he and Shane
got back to their instruments. "1 2 3 4!"

Nails followed through as the singing started, a shriek from the axe with such force that it emphasized the voice, it emphasized the power of the atmosphere the song gave out. It was like a strung Greek chorus singing out to heroes as Children of the Grave was played. The band itself...almost bursted from such an energy boost.

"Holy shit!" Nocturlos said to Nails after finishing. "That sound was bone chilling. It was... almost as if we were playing at a semetary." Shane also gave Nails a speech. "Now. There is one last song I want you to play. I am telling you this, because I believe you have been a fan of us for a long time. I want you join us in playing Dead inside. Master it, and we are done here.
"Don't worry, I'll master it in no time with...how I am," Nails smiled, "I'll join and leave the audience speechless."
"Let's get it started then. Let's Crank it up to eleven people."
Nocturlos ignored what Nails said about leaving the audience speechless. He wasn't in the band yet, and he didn't want to tell him anything yet.

Nails adjusted his amp and strings slightly, as he listened to the music of Dead Inside, he studied it with his ears that rotated and examined, and he carefully placed his fingers upon his guitar once he followed through and Angel Shriek released a haunting echo that merged with the music. He was just auditioning as second guitarist but that guitar made Dead Inside give off ambience it never knew it had.

When they had finished playing, The Seprent riders told Nails to wait back stage, while they went pissing. At the bathroom, the discussion was tense. however they all had the same thing in mind, and agreed on that desicion.

Nocturlos, with Shane and Bloodlord following closely behind, tapped Nails on the shoulder. When he turned around, he said with a serious, slow voice. "We have now discussed whether you are in or not. As the manager, it is up to me to give you the bad news...." He inhaled air though his nose. "...That you are welcome as second guitarist in The seprent riders.
"How is that bad news, manager?" Nails chuckled, "I got in!" He added excitedly.
"You clearly didn't get the joke, did you? I was just trying to disturb your emotions." He then proceeds to shake his hand, while laughing a bit.
Nails shook his hand in return, "Sweet...so when do I move in and get a good bath?"

"For the time being, we live at a hotel not too far from here. You can hang us there. We will heading back to Norway in two days, so if  there is something you want to pack with you, I suggest you do that now. But first, let's grab some beer."

*They all gather around the two cases of beer on the floor. They all take one bottle, open it, and chug it down. Then they grab a second, and a third, and a forth. Nails had stopped by his second one. He knew that these Devil's stomach would fuck up your stomach, and make it letting out some intense noises. The three others however just kept on drinking. Done with the first case, they rapidly began drinking from the next, laughing like hyenas as they did. Nocturlos spotted that Nails wasn't drinking anymore. He grabbed the case and shoved it close to his face "Here. Grab a beer pal. You are in the band now. Celebrate with us, Fuck everything else, this is what's important." Not long after, the second case was empty as well. Shane then called for their manager to order a taxi. Back at the hotel, Bloodlord and Shane were fast to get to bed. Nocturlos was busy fixing up a place to sleep for Nails. Afterwards, he Joined Shane And bloodlord in thei ginormous bed. "Well guys, we did it. We found a fitting secondary guitarist." "He looks a bit odd though." Shane replied. "He doesn't have that Metal look like the rest of us... But for sure, He is one helluva guitar player. And finally, I can do solos again!" Bloodlord then came up with an idea: "We can't go easy on him. Remeber, he must not get the illusion that he is now walking on a red carpet. Remember Jason Newsted from Metallica? The other members were fucking around with him for years, pulling pranks on him, mistreating him and such. Let's have some fun with our new guitarist, shall we?" The two others agreed. "Tomorrow, the fun begins" Nocturlos ended the conversation laughing. "Goodnight you two." They didn't get to sleep just yet though. Suddenly, Bloodlord's stomach began to gurgle. Then. Shane's, followed by Nocturlos'. Judging by how much they drank, the duration of the gurgling would last until next morning. They didn't close their eyes that night. Call it Karma if you like, but Nails is up for some trolling anyway
